Author: Nunubu Nubu
Name: AI Companion
Description: A void-touched bard for Dalamud: chat window, persona.txt, trigger routing with whitelist, ChatTwo IPC/native posting, chronicles, and an OpenAI-compatible backend (works great with Ollama). Tuned for Dalamud 13 + .NET 9.
Punchline: Any song for the price of one’s soul—bargain deal!
Changelog: v5.0.0.6 — Slash commands for Base URL/Model/TLS, fast save/reload, HTTPS localhost support, AiClient cleanup, stabilized listeners, selectable ChatTwo routing.
